RelatedSentence: Phoenix police said a security guard was being interviewed after a shooting at a Phoenix bar in which one person was wounded early Monday morning .
Phoenix police said the shooting happened about 2:30 a.m. at The Funny Farm Cocktails , 4217 W. Thomas Rd .
Police detained the security guard and were interviewing witnesses .

Police detained the security guard and were interviewing witnesses .
The victim was taken to a hospital and was expected to survive , said Phoenix Officer James Holmes .
